National_City.San Diego Academy:
San Diego Academy is a private coeducational K-12 school in the Seventh-day Adventist school system.
It is a part of the Seventh-day Adventist education system, the world's second largest Christian school system. As set forth in its constitution and bylaws, San Diego Academy is governed by a Board of Trustees composed of pastors and elected lay people of the constituent Seventh-day Adventist churches, parents, and alumni.
